entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 6:50 PM EST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few flurries or rain showers. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries becoming mixed with rain showers in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning. Forecast issued 6:50 PM EST Thursday 05 January 2023
